reviewText: Must See. If you don't know history your doomed to repeat it.

I remember seeing this documentary in the 80s and, as my association with Haiti has aged, I have become more appreciative of the value of this insight into Haiti's social and political history. Haitians have certainly paid dearly for their "independence".
Anyone who would be a part of post earthquake Haiti should see this to gain an insight into the history of this wonderful but fragile country.
